GSD.description:
ext4: fix bug_on in __es_tree_search caused by bad quota inode

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 98004f926d27eaccdd2d336b7916a42e07392da1. For more details please see the references link.
